name: LineUp!
description:
Train you reflects, speed and intelligence in this addictive puzzle game!

Find the colour sequence in the matrix as fast as you can.
Lots of levels will guarantee hours of fun!
Beginner, intermediate, advance or expert challenges with endless combinations of colours for you to entertain.

Are you ready for LineUp?

Become a fan of LineUp on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/lineupthegame

Visit our site
http://www.blyts.com

Any problems you may encounter, please let us know by sending us an email, or through our Facebook page.
